comments:
Here is the stack trace below. I guess the problem is that Jira is currently using web-based UI for submitting issues. So, perhaps report details should be copied into clipboard to let user paste it. Maybe web-based wizard should somehow handle that.

Ha!  I just implemented exactly what you suggested, just momements before reading you description.  An info message is popped up instructing the user to paste in the details.
